component.name: createDirectory
component.description: Creates a new directory on directory path.

component.name: listFiles
component.description: Lists all the files in the directory path that match a matcher.

component.name: delete
component.description: Deletes the file specified by the path.

component.name: copy
component.description: Copies the file or folder specified by sourcePath into targetPath.

component.name: move
component.description: Moves the file or folder specified by sourcePath into targetPath.

component.name: rename
component.description: Rename the file to the new name specified.

component.name: splitFile
component.description: Split a file into multiple smaller files.

component.name: mergeFiles
component.description: Merge multiple files in a folder to a single file.

component.name: checkExist
component.description: Check if a file or directory exists.

component.name: exploreZipFile
component.description: List Items In ZIP File Without Extracting.

component.name: read
component.description: Read a specific file or a file in a folder.

component.name: write
component.description: Create a file or write content to a file.

component.name: fetchDirectoryContent
component.description: Fetch file content in a folder in to list of base64 encoded stream.
